text:
In the first full-length trailer for “Fifty Shades Freed,” Ana and Christian return from their honeymoon to new dangerous threats that await them back home.

The new trailer teases more sex and more danger as the newly weds (Dakota Johnson and Jamie Dornan) return from their blissful vacation. We get introduced to a flirty architect (Arielle Kebbel) who is responsible for building the couple’s dream home, and Ana’s former boss, Jack Hyde (Eric Johnson) returns to stir up drama.

Of course, Kim Basinger’s Elena Lincoln is back to toy with Christian’s head.

See Video:Watch 'Fifty Shades Freed' Ominously Tease Both Foreplay and Gun Play

“Fifty Shades Freed” is directed by James Foley, based on a screenplay by Niall Leonard. Tyler Hoechlin, Eloise Mumford, Rita Ora and Luke Grimes also star.

See photos of Dakota Johnson:



Also Read:'Fifty Shades Darker' Star Robinne Lee Lands Lead on Syfy's 'Superstition' (Exclusive)

The “Fifty Shades” film are based on E.L. James’ erotic novels of the same name. Since the first film hit theaters in 2015, the three movies have grossed $280 million at the domestic box office.

“Fifty Shades Freed” opens in theaters on Valentine’s Day 2018.

Watch the trailer above.

Read original story ‘Fifty Shades Freed’ Trailer Teases More Sex, More Dangerous Threats (Video) At TheWrap
